content: वेष्टनं [वेष्ट्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Encompassing, encircling, surrounding; अंगुलिवेष्टनं ‘a finger-ring.’ {@--2@} Coiling round, twisting round; भोगिवेष्टनमार्गेषु चंदनानां समर्पितं <ls>R. 4. 48.</ls> {@--3@} An envelope, a wrapper, cover, covering, case. {@--4@} A turban, tiara; अस्पृष्टालकवेष्टनौ <ls>R. 1. 42</ls>; शिरसा वेष्टन शोभिना <ls n="R.">8. 12</ls>. {@--5@} An enclosure, a fence; क्रीडाशैलः कनककदलीवेष्टनप्रेक्षणीयः <ls>Me. 77.</ls> {@--6@} A girdle, zone. {@--7@} A bandage. {@--8@} The outer ear. {@--9@} Bdellium. {@--10@} A particular attitude in dancing. {@--11@} Grasping, seizing.
